name: Dual Lives ♡♡ [Retro]
description:
An animation inspired by nature and old-school video games.

Music by David McKee (ViRIX Dreamcore) & Juhani Junkala.
Animation & sound design by yours truly.

Cinema 4D, Arnold Renderer, Substance 3D Designer.

1080x1920, 25fps, 2021.

This work is a stylized emulation using the PICO-8 palette.

No frogs were harmed in the making of this video.
